item.title: CA-70 South - Exit 46
item.description: CA-70 south at Exit 46 - CA-162/Oroville Dam Blvd.

item.title: CA-70 South - Exit 47
item.description: CA-70 south at Exit 47 - Montgomery St.

item.title: CA-70 South - Exit 48
item.description: CA-70 south at Exit 48 - Nelson Ave./Grand Ave.

item.title: CA-70 South - Exit 49
item.description: CA-70 South at Exit 49 - Garden Drive.

item.title: CA-149 South at CA-70
item.description: CA-149 south at CA-70. Use CA-70 north for CA-191, Paradise, and Quincy. Use CA-70 south for Oroville and Marysville. This is the southern end of CA-149.

item.title: CA-149 South Approaching CA-70
item.description: CA-149 south approaching CA-70. Use CA-70 north for Paradise, Quincy, and CA-191.

item.title: CA-99 South at CA-149
item.description: CA-99 south at CA-149. Use CA-149 south for CA-70, Oroville, and Marysville. Continue south on CA-99 for Yuba City.

item.title: CA-99 South Approaching CA-149
item.description: CA-99 South approaching CA-149. Use CA-149 South for Oroville, Marysville, and CA-70. Continue south on CA-99 for Yuba City.

item.title: CA-70 South Exit 17
item.description: CA-70 south at Exit 17 - CA-65/Roseville. CA-70 continues south to Sacramento.

item.title: CA-70 South Approaching Exit 17
item.description: CA-70 south approaching CA-65 (Exit 17). Use left lanes for CA-65 to Wheatland and Roseville.

item.title: CA-70 South Exit 18A
item.description: CA-70 south approaching Exit 18A - Olivehurst.

item.title: CA-70 South Exit 18B
item.description: CA-70 south approaching Exit 18B - Erle Road.

item.title: CA-70 South Exit 20A
item.description: CA-70 south at Exit 20A - Feather River Blvd.

item.title: CA-70 South Exit 20B
item.description: CA-70 south at Exit 20B - North Beale Road.

item.title: CA-70 South - Begin Freeway
item.description: Begin freeway on CA-70 south crossing the Yuba River.

item.title: CA-70 South/CA-20 West Split
item.description: CA-70 South/CA-20 West at split. Turn left for CA-70 South to Sacramento. Turn right for CA-20 west to Yuba City.

item.title: CA-70 South/CA-20 West Split
item.description: CA-70 South/CA-20 West approaching split. Use left lane for CA-70 south to Sacramento. Use right lane for CA-20 west to Yuba City.

item.title: CA-70 South at CA-20 East
item.description: CA-70 south at CA-20. CA-20 joins CA-70 south for a few blocks through Marysville.

item.title: CA-70 South Approaching CA-20 East
item.description: CA-70 south approaching CA-20.

item.title: CA-70 South Approaching CA-20 East
item.description: CA-70 south approaching CA-20 east to Grass Valley. Continue straight for CA-70 South/CA-20 West to Yuba City and Sacramento.

item.title: CA-162 West at CA-70 South
item.description: Overhead on CA-162 west. Turn left for CA-70 south to Marysville. Continue straight for CA-162 west to Willows.

item.title: CA-162 West at CA-70 North
item.description: CA-162 west at CA-70 north freeway entrance.

item.title: CA-162 West Approaching CA-70
item.description: CA-162 west approaching CA-70 North to Quincy onramp.

item.title: CA-70 West at CA-49 South
item.description: CA-70 west at CA-49 south to Loyalton. This is the northern beginning of CA-49 which goes through the California Gold Country.

item.title: CA-70 West Approaching CA-49
item.description: CA-70 west approaching CA-49 south.

item.title: CA-70 West Approaching CA-49
item.description: CA-70 west approaching CA-49 south to Loyalton.

item.title: CA-70 West at CA-284 North
item.description: CA-70 west at CA-284 north to Frenchman Lake.

item.title: CA-70 West Approaching CA-284
item.description: CA-70 west approaching CA-284 North/Frenchman Lake Road.

item.title: Begin CA-70 West at US-395 South
item.description: Begin CA-70 west at US-395 south onramp to Reno.

item.title: US-395 North Exit 8 Offramp at CA-70
item.description: US-395 north Exit 8 offramp at CA-70 west to Portola and Quincy.

item.description: US-395 north approaching Exit 8 - CA-70/Portola/Quincy.

item.description: Distance marker to Quincy, Portola, and US-395 on CA-70 east, in Butte County.

item.description: Distance marker to Quincy and US-395 just north of Oroville.

item.description: CA-70 east at Exit 20A in Marysville.

item.title: CA-70 North at CA-149
item.description: CA-70 east at CA-149 junction in Butte County. CA-149 connects CA-70 with CA-99 for Oroville to Chico traffic.

item.title: CA-70 North at CA-191
item.description: CA-70 east at CA-191 junction to Paradise in Butte County.

item.title: CA-70 North at CA-20
item.description: CA-70 east at CA-20 west to Yuba City in Marysville.

item.title: CA-70 North Bus. CA-70 Exit
item.description: For Bus. CA-70 use Exit 46 on CA-70 east in Oroville.
